org.js4ms.rest.handler

Interface TransactionHandler

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Session
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractSession, AbstractTimedSession, HttpTransactionHandler, LoggingConfigurationHandler, LoggingOutputHandler, MulticastReflector, Presentation, RtspSession, RtspTransactionHandler, TransactionDispatcher, TransactionHandlerList, TransferCSeqHeader, TransferSessionHeader, TransferTimestampHeader, VerifyAcceptEncodingHeader, VerifyRequireHeader

    public interface TransactionHandler

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean handleTransaction(Request request, Response response) 

    • Method Detail

      • handleTransaction

        boolean handleTransaction(Request request,
                        Response response)
                          throws IOException
        Parameters:
        request - - The Request message sent from the client to the server to initiate the transaction.
        response - - The Response message that will be sent from the server back to the client.
        Returns:
      • true to indicate that the handler has changed the response status code and transaction handling should be terminated.
      • false to indicate that the handler has not changed the response status code and transaction handling may continue.
        • Throws:
        RequestException
        IOException
